color=”#C1B086″ divider_weight=”4px” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”70px” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Open Sans|600||on|||||” text_text_color=”#222222″ text_font_size=”12px” text_letter_spacing=”1.1px” text_line_height=”1.6em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”-19px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”-32px||19px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”-32px||19px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

BUSH HOTEL IN MULDERSDRIFT GAUTENG

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Noto Serif||||||||” header_text_color=”#222222″ header_font_size=”31px” header_line_height=”1.3em” text_orientation=”center” min_height=”62px” custom_margin=”-4px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

ACTIVITIES

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Open Sans||||||||” text_text_color=”#5f6060″ text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”-4px||-41px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”-12px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”-12px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Open Sans||||||||” text_text_color=”#5f6060″ text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”-4px||-41px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”-12px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”-12px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

“Do I need to get in my car again and go look for something to do?”   26 Degree South to the rescue!  We’ve got you covered. We want you to feel at home at our home. We offer a range of on-site activities that needs little more than putting your exploring shoes on. One foot at a time.

Mountain Biking |  Hiking  |  Quad Biking  |  Game Viewing  |  Bird watching  |  Fishing  |  Soul searching and much more.

26 Degree South has something for everyone in a uniquely innovative way. For those seeking extra adventure, 26 Degree South Hotel is less than 30 mins away from the Cradle of Humankind, Rhino and Lion Nature Reserve, and the Sterkfontein Caves.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” max_width=”1300px” custom_margin=”|auto|-4px|auto||” custom_padding=”||15px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://bushcampsite.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/10.jpg” title_text=”10″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Noto Serif||||||||” header_text_color=”#222222″ header_font_size=”31px” header_line_height=”1.3em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”-4px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”|15px||15px|false|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

SAFARI

Various times from early morning to late afternoon game drives. Enquire at hotel for times.

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://bushcampsite.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/1G3A4879.jpg” title_text=”1G3A4879″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” min_height=”303px” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#7CDA24″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Noto Serif||||||||” header_text_color=”#222222″ header_font_size=”31px” header_line_height=”1.3em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”-4px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”|15px||15px|false|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

QUAD BIKING

Guided trails offered by 26 Degree Hotel. Option for one or two hour rides out and about.

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://bushcampsite.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/f.jpg” title_text=”f” _builder_version=”4.17.6″ _module_preset=”default” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#8300E9″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.6″ header_font=”Noto Serif||||||||” header_text_color=”#222222″ header_font_size=”34px” header_line_height=”1.3em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”-4px||||false|false” custom_padding=”3px|||||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”|15px||15px|false|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

FISHING

Join us every Saturday for some catch and release fishing. Guests will be accompanied to the river and assisted by an SFA fishing guide and be provide with a fishing rod, tackle as well as bait. PREBOOKING IS NEEDED !

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.17.6″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” max_width=”1300px” custom_padding=”0px||15px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://bushcampsite.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/Untitled-design-1.png” title_text=”Untitled design” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#8300E9″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Noto Serif||||||||” header_text_color=”#222222″ header_font_size=”31px” header_line_height=”1.3em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”-4px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”|15px||15px|false|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

HOT AIR BALLOONING

Early morning sunrise with amazing views over this pristine property. Looking for all our game and having a romantic moment with your significant other.

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://bushcampsite.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/11.jpg” title_text=”11″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#E09900″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Noto Serif||||||||” header_text_color=”#222222″ header_font_size=”31px” header_line_height=”1.3em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”-4px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”|15px||15px|false|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

HIKING TRAIL

Beautiful views and great bird sightings along our walking trails within the safe and secure conservancy. You can see some of the locals and enjoy being in nature and enjoying the COVID free fresh air

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://bushcampsite.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/9.jpg” title_text=”9″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#8300E9″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Noto Serif||||||||” header_text_color=”#222222″ header_font_size=”31px” header_line_height=”1.3em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”-4px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”|15px||15px|false|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

TEAM BUILDING

From and Amazing race to treasure hunts. Bring your team to 26 Degree Hotel and we can make the word TEAM, have a new meaning.

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://bushcampsite.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/5.jpg” title_text=”5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#bcb600″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Noto Serif||||||||” header_text_color=”#222222″ header_font_size=”31px” header_line_height=”1.3em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”-4px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”|15px||15px|false|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

MOUNTAIN BIKING

22km trail from the hotel and within the cradle moon conservancy. Can be enjoyed from advanced to beginner riders.

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_url=”https://bushcampsite.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/26D-South-ACTIVITIES-2024-19032024.pdf” button_text=”CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD OUR ACTIVITIES 2024 PRICE LIST ” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.24.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_bg_color=”#0C71C3″ hover_enabled=”0″ custom_css_main_element=”width: 100%” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
